# Normalize chars
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Replaces diacritical characters with non-diacritical ones (eg, ö -> o), plus some specialities like transforming æ -> ae, ß -> ss.


## Parameter

`None`

## Advanced Parameter

`None`
